org.spongepowered.api.world

Interface World

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BiomeArea, BlockVolume, Contextual, EntityUniverse, Extent, Identifiable, LocationCompositeValueStore, MutableBiomeArea, MutableBlockVolume, TileEntityVolume, Viewer, WeatherUniverse

    public interface World
extends Extent, WeatherUniverse, Viewer, Contextual
    A loaded Minecraft world.

    • Method Summary

        Description copied from interface: Extent

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The location in this extent

      • getLocation

        Location<World> getLocation(com.flowpowered.math.vector.Vector3d position)
        Description copied from interface: Extent
        Gets a location in this extent at the given position. Essentially, this is a 3D pointer in the extent. This method supports sub-block positions. Block-related methods use flooring to get integer coordinates.
        Specified by:
        getLocation in interface Extent
        Parameters:
        position - The position
        Returns:
        The location in this extent

      • getLocation

        Location<World> getLocation(double x,
                            double y,
                            double z)
        Description copied from interface: Extent
        Gets a location in this extent at the given position. Essentially, this is a 3D pointer in the extent. This method supports sub-block positions. Block-related methods use flooring to get integer coordinates.
        Specified by:
        getLocation in interface Extent
        Parameters:
        x - The X position
        y - The Y position
        z - The Z position
        Returns:
        The location in this extent

      • getDifficulty

        Difficulty getDifficulty()
        Gets the Difficulty setting for this world.
        Returns:
        Difficulty of the world

      • getName

        String getName()
        Gets the name of the world.

        The world name may randomly generated or user-defined. It may or may not be safe to be used in a filename.

        Returns:
        The world name
        See Also:
        A method to get a unique identifier

      • loadChunk

        Optional<Chunk> loadChunk(com.flowpowered.math.vector.Vector3i position,
                          boolean shouldGenerate)
        Get the chunk at the given position if it exists or if shouldGenerate is true and the chunk is generated.
        Parameters:
        position - The position
        shouldGenerate - True to generate a new chunk
        Returns:
        The loaded or generated chunk, if already generated

      • loadChunk

        Optional<Chunk> loadChunk(int x,
                          int y,
                          int z,
                          boolean shouldGenerate)
        Get the chunk at the given position if it exists or if shouldGenerate is true and the chunk is generated.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate
        y - The y coordinate
        z - The z coordinate
        shouldGenerate - True to generate a new chunk
        Returns:
        The loaded or generated chunk, if already generated

      • unloadChunk

        boolean unloadChunk(Chunk chunk)
        Unloads the given chunk from the world. Returns a boolean flag for whether the operation was successful.
        Parameters:
        chunk - The chunk to unload
        Returns:
        Whether the operation was successful

      • getLoadedChunks

        Iterable<Chunk> getLoadedChunks()
        Returns a Collection of all actively loaded chunks in this world.

        The ordering of the returned chunks is undefined.

        Returns:
        The loaded chunks

      • getEntity

        Optional<Entity> getEntity(UUID uuid)
        Gets the entity whose UUID matches the provided id, possibly returning no entity if the entity is not loaded or non-existant.

        For world implementations, only some parts of the world is usually loaded, so this method may return no entity if the entity is not loaded.

        Parameters:
        uuid - The unique id
        Returns:
        An entity, if available

      • getWorldBorder

        WorldBorder getWorldBorder()
        Gets the world border for the world.
        Returns:
        The world border

      • getGameRule

        Optional<String> getGameRule(String gameRule)
        Gets the specified GameRule value.
        Parameters:
        gameRule - The name of the GameRule.
        Returns:
        The GameRule value, if it exists.

      • getGameRules

        Map<String,String> getGameRules()
        Gets a map of the currently set game rules and their values.
        Returns:
        An immutable map of the game rules

      • getDimension

        Dimension getDimension()
        Returns the Dimension of this world.
        Returns:
        The Dimension

      • getWorldGenerator

        WorldGenerator getWorldGenerator()
        Gets the WorldGenerator for this world.

        Any changes made to the world generator won't affect the world until setWorldGenerator(WorldGenerator), and even then only newly changed chunks will be affected.

        Returns:
        The world generator

      • setWorldGenerator

        void setWorldGenerator(WorldGenerator generator)
        Sets the WorldGenerator for this world to use to create new chunks.
        Parameters:
        generator - The new generator

      • doesKeepSpawnLoaded

        boolean doesKeepSpawnLoaded()
        Returns whether this World's spawn chunks remain loaded when no players are present. Note: This method will default to this World 's DimensionType's keepLoaded value unless a plugin overrides it.
        Returns:
        True if World remains loaded without players, false if not

      • setKeepSpawnLoaded

        void setKeepSpawnLoaded(boolean keepLoaded)
        Sets whether this World's spawn chunks remain loaded when no players are present. Note: This method will override the default DimensionType's keepLoaded value.
        Parameters:
        keepLoaded - Whether this World's spawn chunks remain loaded without players

      • getWorldStorage

        WorldStorage getWorldStorage()
        Gets the associated WorldStorage persisting this world.
        Returns:
        The associated world storage

      • getScoreboard

        Scoreboard getScoreboard()
        Gets the @link Scoreboard} for this world.
        Returns:
        The associated Scoreboard

      • setScoreboard

        void setScoreboard(Scoreboard scoreboard)
        Sets the Scoreboard for this world.
        Parameters:
        scoreboard - The scoreboard to set

      • getCreationSettings

        WorldCreationSettings getCreationSettings()
        Gets the WorldCreationSettings which were used to create this world.
        Returns:
        The settings

        Returns:
